snippet: The subject of the newest exhibition in the Matrix contemporary art series encompasses the global effects of violence, corruption and the misuse of power.
abstract: Exhibit Ahmed Alsoudani/Matrix 165, newest exhibition in Matrix contemporary art series at Wadsworth Atheneum Museum of Art, encompasses the global effects of violence, corruption and misuse of power in the works of Ahmed Alsoudani.
lead_paragraph: The subject of the newest exhibition in the Matrix contemporary art series encompasses the global effects of violence, corruption and the misuse of power.

headline.seo: ‘Ahmed Alsoudani/Matrix 165,’ at the Wadsworth Atheneum Museum of Art in Hartford
headline.main: Trying to Make Sense Out of Chaos
headline.print_headline: Trying to Make Sense Out of Chaos
